creator: marc.jenzer@j-solution.ch
text:
You forget the <font-triplet> - End-Tag:

now (wrong):
<font metrics-file="cyberbit.xml" kerning="yes" embed-
file="C:\WINNT\Fonts\Cyberbit.ttf"> <font-triplet name="Cyberbit" 
style="normal" weight="normal"> </font> 

right:
<font metrics-file="cyberbit.xml" kerning="yes" embed-
file="C:\WINNT\Fonts\Cyberbit.ttf"> <font-triplet name="Cyberbit" 
style="normal" weight="normal"/> </font>

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
